name: Drive Home (Zeekerss)
description:
Have fun on your drive home! Drive Home was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, where the theme was "Out Of Control."

Press [W] and [A] to steer left and right in order to stay straight.

Move the mouse to turn your head. Click to shoot. [R] to reload. If the car flips over at any point, wait about 5 seconds and it should fix itself. (If it doesn't, you must have two tires on the ground.)
